list.name: SMOKE-TRAILS
list.description: When Leon uses his Super, he gains a x% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.
list.descriptionHtml: When Leon uses his Super, he gains a x% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.

list.name: INVISIHEAL
list.description: Leon recovers x health per second while his Super is active.
list.descriptionHtml: Leon recovers x health per second while his Super is active.
